definition.name: Azure App Service Settings
definition.description: Configure Azure Apps with app settings, connection strings and other general configuration settings
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: app-name
inputs.description: Name of the Azure Web App

inputs.name: slot-name
inputs.description: Name of an existing slot other than the production slot. Default value is production

inputs.name: app-settings-json
inputs.description: Application settings using the JSON syntax set as value of secret variable: APP_SETTINGS

inputs.name: connection-strings-json
inputs.description: Connection Strings using the JSON syntax set as value of secret variable: CONNECTION_STRINGS

inputs.name: general-settings-json
inputs.description: General configuration settings using dictionary syntax - Key Value pairs

inputs.name: mask-inputs
inputs.description: Set it to false if you want to provide input jsons as plain text/you do not want input json values to be masked. This will apply to app-settings-json and connection-strings-json. Default is true

outputs.name: webapp-url
outputs.description: URL to work with your webapp

latest_release.name: GitHub Action for configuring settings  for Azure Web App
